sweath.misc.AboutTimeMissingHelp: The Calendar/Weather mod requires AboutTime by Tim Posney in order to run properly.
sweath.seasons.DrierOrWetter: Is the season drier or wetter than average?
sweath.seasons.HotterOrColder: Is the season hotter or colder than average?
sweath.seasons.SeasonColor: What color do you want to display with the season?
sweath.seasons.SeasonDayStart: What day does the season start?
sweath.seasons.SeasonHourBright: Enter the hour it gets bright
sweath.seasons.SeasonHourDark: Enter the hour it gets dark
sweath.seasons.SeasonIntro: Enter the start date and weather modifiers for each season. The Color dropdown changes the color of the weather icon for a visual indication of the season. Entering an @RollTable[] into the 'Table' will disable advanced weather generation and instead, weather will be generated via the table. Note this will disable FXMaster integration.
sweath.seasons.SeasonMonthStart: What month does the season start?
sweath.seasons.SeasonRolltable: OPTIONAL: Entering a @RollTable[] will disable advanced weather generation and instead, weather will be generated via the table.
sweath.seasons.Title: Seasons
sweath.settings.DialogDisplayHelp: When checked, clients without GM-level permissions will be able to see the calendar displayed
sweath.settings.NightCycleLabelHelp: When checked, the scene will undergo a night cycle, darkening during the night and getting brighter during the day.
sweath.settings.NoGlobalHelp: When checked, once the scene reaches max darkness, it will disable the scene's Global Illumination
sweath.settings.playerSeeWeatherHelp: When checked, players can toggle the side panel displaying weather information
sweath.settings.OutputWeatherToChatHelp: Select who can see the weather messages in chat.
sweath.settings.WeatherLabelHelp: When checked, if the FXMaster module is installed, it will generate weather effects such as rain and clouds.
sweath.weather.SelectBiome: Select a biome to auto-populate climate and humidity
sweath.notice.Acknowledge: Got it! Don't show this again.
